nodeList.loreText: As they sow, so shall they reap.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
Hold ability key to channel for up to 2 seconds. You take 75% less damage while channelling.

When you stop channelling you unleash an attack against nearby enemies, which deals more damage for each hit you received while channelling.

nodeList.description: You have increased health regeneration while channelling Rebuke.
nodeList.nodeDescription: You have [25%] increased health regen per point while channelling.
